blogs.title: Emacs - The Virtual OS for a Lifetime
blogs.subtitle: Extensible All-in-One Environment for Text Editting
blogs.description: A initial exploration of how I can use Emacs as a virtual OS while using Vim as a primary text editor.

blogs.title: Vim - The Text Editor for a Lifetime
blogs.subtitle: Ideal Keyboard Interfaces for Programmer's Sanity
blogs.description: A brief summury the users who don't want to read everything so they can decide whether this post is helpful or not.

blogs.title: Getting Started with TensorFlow and OpenAI
blogs.subtitle: Overview of Reinforcement ML Development Environment
blogs.description: An introduction to start exploring the world of AI techniques and applications with Ubuntu 18.04 64-bit, Google TensorFlow, OpenAI Foundation OpenAI Gym, and JetBrains Pycharm IDE.

blogs.title: Network Topology Virtualization with Proxmox and GNS3 Server
blogs.subtitle: Exploration of Software Defined Network Technologies
blogs.description: An introduction to construct a distributed virtual environment for network engineering experiments and exercises with the Proxmox, the GNS3 server, and several virtual machines.

blogs.title: C - C++ - All in One Include File
blogs.subtitle: Convenient Programming Cheatsheet for Includes
blogs.description: A header file that contains all possible C/C++ standard libraries.

blogs.title: Shellcode in Modern OSs
blogs.subtitle: Minimalistic Machine Code Execution for Modern Computers
blogs.description: A brief introduction of shellcode creation for beginners in Modern OSs which have numerous protections to prevent illegal/malicious code execution attempts. 32-bit executable will be used for experimental & educational purposes.

blogs.title: NVIDIA Jetson TX2 Dev Kits Setup (TensorRT)
blogs.subtitle: Embedded Machine Learning Starter Kits
blogs.description: A brief overview (installation and performance benchmark provided by NVIDIA) of TensorRT, an execution plug-in for TensorFlow to improve the performance of deep learning models.

blogs.title: NVIDIA Jetson TX2 Dev Kits Setup (Jetpack)
blogs.subtitle: Embedded Machine Learning Starter Kits
blogs.description: A brief overview (installation and performance benchmark provided by NVIDIA) of TensorRT, an execution plug-in for TensorFlow to improve the performance of deep learning models.

portfolios.title: BambooShoot
portfolios.subtitle: A Career Management Solution for Professionals
portfolios.description: A Web-app that helps professionals and students to organize vocational activities for career management.

portfolios.title: AIAbalone
portfolios.subtitle: An Abalone Game Playing Agent
portfolios.description: Implemented a traditional board game Abalone in Python and Pygame with an artificial intelligence game playing agent using Minimax Alpha-Beta Pruning as a search method.

portfolios.title: Bitcoin Casino
portfolios.subtitle: An Android App for Crypto-currency Newbies
portfolios.description: Provide a real-world based simulation on crypto-currency investment and related information (charts & news) for those who want to learn about it without risks.

portfolios.title: Safebox for Students
portfolios.subtitle: Omnipresent Protection Blackbox
portfolios.description: Suggests a preventive solution for abuse, violence, and any illegal activities in schools. This device also has a study planner to help students for preparation of school works.

portfolios.title: Parallel Selves
portfolios.subtitle: Experiences in the Multiverse
portfolios.description: Presents an artistic incarnation of relative time and space to provide indirect experiences of lives in the Multiverse.

portfolios.title: The Cosmic Flow
portfolios.subtitle: The Moment of Creation
portfolios.description: Introduces an interactive artwork that shows the holistic dynamics deeply embedded in the universe by integrate the generative visual elements with the view's motion.

portfolios.title: The Cube
portfolios.subtitle: A Surrounding-included Virtual Reality Box
portfolios.description: Introduces a futuristic platform that allows audiences to have augmented spatial experiences of virtual identities.

portfolios.title: Universe of Entities
portfolios.subtitle: Informational Entirety
portfolios.description: Aims to build a theoretical substructure of the computational creativity by establishing the fundamental principles on the ecology of the totalistic symbol system.

portfolios.title: Money is Beautiful
portfolios.subtitle: See Different
portfolios.description: Presents a micro-level of viewpoint for U.S. currencies to scrutinize implied symbolism of economic hegemony.

portfolios.title: Face Information Marketing Strategy
portfolios.subtitle: Transformation of Physiological Information
portfolios.description: Describes a futuristic marketing strategy that utilizes a 3-dimensional camera to read a person's economic behaviors based on physiologic information and semiologic analysis.

portfolios.title: Virtual Reality Room
portfolios.subtitle: An Alternative Way for VR
portfolios.description: Suggests an alternative way to enjoy a VR experience without being alienated with surroundings.

portfolios.title: Foodtainment
portfolios.subtitle: A Research Project on the Essence of Amusement
portfolios.description: Investigates the essential principle hidden under the way we feel amusement from diverse daily activities.

portfolios.title: AI Design Machine
portfolios.subtitle: A High-Level Scheme for Generative Design
portfolios.description: Suggests a high-level scheme that contains necessary data and procedures to develop an AI design agent.

portfolios.title: Pamphlet of Korea University
portfolios.subtitle: Prints Design
portfolios.description: Proposes several prints design for various purposes in visual communication.

portfolios.title: Green Umbrella
portfolios.subtitle: An Umbrella without Wastes
portfolios.description: Suggests a practical design for an umbrella that doesn't need to put a plastic cover to prevent a wet floor when inside of the building.

portfolios.title: Sympathy of Space
portfolios.subtitle: Urban Design for the International District
portfolios.description: Develops a zoning plan and an architectural landscape design for the International District in Seoul city. It suggests a holistic land-management solution for mixed-cultural areas.

portfolios.title: Golf 2.0
portfolios.subtitle: A Golf Course with Narratives
portfolios.description: Constructs a narrative golf course for a golf simulator Golfzone (http://www.golfzon.com). Each hole is made to represent a card from the Tarot cards major arcana for continuous user experiences.

portfolios.title: Apple Tree Band Concert 2011
portfolios.subtitle: At Abbey Road (Seoul)
portfolios.description: Plays some rock, blues, and pop.

portfolios.title: Humane Golf Fitting
portfolios.subtitle: Golf Club as a Human-Ball Interface
portfolios.description: Improves golf clubs by applying not only the technical/scientific principles but also operational usability for an imperfect user.

portfolios.title: Urban Traffic Square
portfolios.subtitle: A Realistic Plan for Green City
portfolios.description: Converts the intersections to parks to minimize accidents, provide green space, improve traffic flow, and encourage various activities.

portfolios.title: Landtainment
portfolios.subtitle: An Augmented Reality Game Plan for Local Economy
portfolios.description: Launches an adventure role-playing game by using the AR technologies with the assets of the community (traditional markets, historic sites, local attractions) to promote the local economy.

portfolios.title: Roof Garden of Korea University
portfolios.subtitle: A Shelter for the Weak
portfolios.description: Incorporates a user-specific imaginary environment into the design for a roof garden of Dong-won global leadership center with Feng Shui principles.

portfolios.title: Booklet of Korea University
portfolios.subtitle: Design As Vehicle for Secret Code
portfolios.description: Conveys multi-layered meanings through various symbolic elements with gestalt principles.

portfolios.title: Siting Guidelines of Green Space with GIS
portfolios.subtitle: GIS Geo-value Analysis
portfolios.description: Discovers the most effective location for green space in a city for a urban development plan by using the Geographic Information System technology.

portfolios.title: The Symbol
portfolios.subtitle: Infinite Destination
portfolios.description: A graphical representation on what the ultimate path leads to.
